content: प्रत्यवायः {@--1@} Decrease, diminution. {@--2@} An obstacle, impediment; <ls>U. 1. 8.</ls> {@--3@} A contrary or opposite course, contrariety; <ls>Ms. 4. 245.</ls> {@--4@} A sin, an offence, sinfulness; अनुत्पत्तिं तथा चान्ये प्रत्यवायस्य मन्वते <ls>Jābāli</ls>. {@--5@} Disappointment. {@--6@} Disappearance of an existing thing. {@--7@} Non-production of what does not exist.
